title: A third summoner spell?
body:
I came up with the idea for this while I was playing a game as a jungler 

It would allow junglers more options other than flash and smite 

Unsealed spellbook might need to be buffed or nerfed though

replies.body:
it is more two summoners spells plus flash or ghost (you always need to have one of those)
also, it would probably come with the introduction of more summoner spells 
it would make for more variety which is what i was going for

It could get _very_ broken and would throw the meta upside-down.

Possible outcomes:

* Everyone runs {{summoner:12}}  without needing to sacrifice a combat spell - welcome to URF, your base is belong to us.

* Supports all run {{summoner:14}} {{summoner:3}} , and all supports are now {{champion:63}} or {{champion:101}}.

* Every bruiser has {{summoner:6}} 

* Fizz runs {{summoner:14}} {{summoner:3}} {{summoner:7}}

* Jungle meta goes insane as combat spells get involved.
